game.name: Little Dino Adventure
game.description:
The lovely egg hunting season has just begun and the little dinosaur has decided to go on his most awaited adventure! But the problem is that he is very little and not able to complete this tricky journey on his own so the cute animal needs your help.  Why do not you join him? Join Little Dino Adventure and be prepared to help this little Dinosaur roam around the prehistoric realm to collect eggs! There are multiple stages to walk through so guide him to keep him alive through different zones.

Click the play button and get ready to enter the Jurassic-themed adventure fun in this brand new adventure challenge!  This area is full of eggs and your job is to control the little dinosaur to grab as many small eggs as you can to score the highest points. Do not forget to grab even more eggs to score by tapping the dinosaur head on the yellow blocks. You can sot three large golden eggs in each of the three stages. Make sure to grab all of the three eggs to complete each stage successfully.

Some extra points can be added to your final score if you jump over your enemies. Three different zones include a scorching desert, a lush jungle and a winter location where you can see snow everywhere. You would have different challenges to face-off right from the bloodthirsty dinosaurs to the deadly obstacles. Try to keep your character away from falling down between the gaps. Track the health of your character by looking at the upper left corner of the screen! Be careful since you have only 3 lives to use in this HTML5 platform game!
